text: Alberto Nelson Sanchez (July 10, 1936 – October 22, 2017), known professionally as Al Hurricane, was an American singer-songwriter. He was dubbed "The Godfather" of New Mexico music. He released more than thirty albums, and was best known for his works to New Mexico’s unique style of Spanish music. His signature look, which included an eye-patch, was due to an automobile accident that occurred during the 1960s. Sanchez died of complications from prostate cancer on October 22, 2017 in Albuquerque, New Mexico, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American saxophonists Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pianists Category:American country guitarists Category:American country singers Category:American rock singers Category:Singers from New Mexico Category:Writers from New Mexico
title: Al Hurricane
